comment._content:
Other views of the funeral of Charles Gilbert Gates, November 2, 1913:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4408875836/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4526078148/]

Gates at Cody, Wyoming, on a hunting trip -- shortly before his fatal heart attack:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465066630/in/photostream/]

The irrepressible Mr. Gates, who said "Speed is Life!"
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3682650360/]
